Name: Shocker Cape
LongDescription: Boosts the maximum PP. Keep it in the Treasure Bag to give its benefit to all of these team members: Pichu, Pikachu, and Raichu.  You can get a Shocker Cape at the Croagunk Swap Shop by swapping: a Pichu Hair, a Pichu Card, and an Express Tag. That's the easy way!  An item with a ☆☆☆-rarity rating is very hard to get. It's beyond valuable!
